Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 6/2/1985...
Injured on 6/1/1986 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 5/1/1988 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: SS Mark McLemore, P Bobby Thigpen, P Arthur Rhodes, P Jack Morris. Going to CHC: LF Tim Raines)...
Had first career hit on 7/13/1989, off Jeff Pico (LAD)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,177,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/20/1990 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,445,714 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,394,286 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/4/1993 to a 2-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
